metadata.name: Repentance Negative-
metadata.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/uUyLtyi.png[/img]
We present to you a mod that is not of the best quality, but with interesting jokes! Also, dig through the mod files, you never know what might be hiding there...
[img]https://i.imgur.com/DPnAIbt.png[/img] [list] [*] [b]Repentogon required![/b] [*] Adds 2 new character! [*] Adds 30+ new items! [*] Adds 5+ new trinkets [*] Adds 1 new card, pill and new pickups and machine [*] Adds brand new soundtracks! [*] Adds 3 new challenges! [*] Adds 9+ unlocks for mod [*] Supports some mods: External Item Description [*] Supported Languages: English and Russian [*] If you want lock/unlock everything in one second, then send console command: "lockrepnegative" / "unlockrepnegative"
[img]https://i.imgur.com/W2mRbFG.png[/img] [url=https://discord.gg/UTDAB2DBzY] Join our community Discord server! [/url] THE WIKI OF THE MOD : https://isaacguru.com/mod/repentance_negative
[img]https://i.imgur.com/ZlJUAyb.png[/img] Need help or found bug? Write about it in the discussion https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/3311611422/6149188808687413960/
To play with this mod you need to download REPENTOGON Download guide: https://repentogon.com/install.html
***[b]CREDITS[/b]***
Pixel Cube, Crice Enelace, BrakeDude, Killer Queen, RobertOn, Izzek , Kontay, Dimawiw, Vor_kakisha, Aristotiepenguin, Viruniak, KREKS and etc.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3242166563]Also try mod from CriceEnelace: Elitium! It has new content for Rep Negative! [/url]
